answers.answer: Yes my midwife said some women just measure small and in all reality nothing is wrong. That happened to me 2 weeks ago but my baby was measuring okay.

This happened to me a couple months ago. My baby was measuring small, in the 22%, then at next appt she was measuring closer to normal, in the 39%. Then I went back more recently and she's in the 49%. Maybe ur baby just needs to hit a growth spurt or maybe u just make smaller babies. Try not to stress much about it I'm sure ur lil love is just fine :)

I have gestational diabetes,  i have to eat a strict diet, so i stopped gaining weight which made them worry. Everyone tells me I'm small,  nobody believes I'm due in 2 weeks.  We did a growth scan at 35 weeks and he was perfect, don't panic, babies take what they need.  Just think you get to see your little one an extra time and know for sure how they're doing in there.

question: So doctor said I'm measuring small and is having me come back for an ultrasound to check babies growth and fluid in sack I'm 36 weeks has anyone experienced this
title: help
